import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { detailsProduct } from '../redux/actions/ProductAction' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Loading from '../components/Loading'; import MessageBox from '../components/MassageBox'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productId = match.params.id const productDetails = useSelector((state => state.productDetails)); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsProduct(productId)) }, [dispatch, productId]) return (
go back {loading ? () : error ? ({error}) :
  • {product.name}
  • {product.description}
  • {product.rating}
  • price : R {product?.price}
  • status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? {product.countInStock} items still available : we are out of stock}
}
) } export default ProductScreen
